articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: Blistering Heatwaves Put 16 European Cities on Red Alert | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The alerts, which indicate risks even for healthy people, apply to tourist hotspots including Rome, Florence, and Bologna for the coming days, reports the BBC.
articles.content:
Authorities in Italy on Saturday issued red alerts in 16 cities due to blistering heat waves that continue to bake much of southern Europe.
